item.title: First Blog
item.description: What is this blog for? As per the suggestion from one of my seniors, (@vnzongzna) I’ll blog about the open source projects and any other cool stuff that I come accross.
item.content:
What is this blog for?

As per the suggestion from one of my seniors, (@vnzongzna) I’ll blog about the open source projects and any other cool stuff that I come accross.
